long_description: No more grocery bags dangling from handlebars: The large-volume, waterproof Ortlieb Velo-Shopper pannier goes on and off your rack quickly, is easy to carry and keeps your groceries in great shape. Coated nylon fabric ensures your goodies stay dry in the rain; inner stiffener provides pannier stability and structure both on and off of the bike. Pannier's top flap closes tight and secures with a magnetic closure, which is easy to open with one hand. Removable, adjustable shoulder strap and carry handle make it easy to tote the pannier off-bike. Zippered interior pocket in the Ortlieb Velo-Shopper single pannier keeps small items from getting lost. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. QL2 mounting system adjusts without tools; mount allows the bag to be attached on left (standard) or right side. QL2 mounting system is compatible with all standard rear racks with tube diameters of 8, 10 or 16mm, rack sold separately.
short_description: No more grocery bags dangling from handlebars: The large-volume, waterproof Ortlieb Velo-Shopper pannier goes on and off your rack quickly, is easy to carry and keeps your groceries in great shape.
